usage.cn: 没有谁对不起谁,只有谁不懂得珍惜谁.
usage.eng: No one indebted for others,while many people don't know how to cherish others.

usage.cn: 有太多的不如意垫底 就会知道如意时该如何珍惜
usage.eng: Only when you have too many disappointments in the bottom will you know how to cherish the good times.

usage.cn: 生命是短暂的，活出它。真爱是稀有的，抓住它。愤怒是有害的，放下它。恐惧是可怕的，面对它。回忆是甜美的，珍惜它。
usage.eng: Life is short, live it.Love is rare, grab it.Anger is bad, dump it.Fear is awful, face it.Memories are sweet, cherish it.

usage.cn: 一个人一生可以爱上很多的人，等你获得真正属于你的幸福之后，你就会明白一起的伤痛其实是一种财富，它让你学会更好地去把握和珍惜你爱的人。
usage.eng: One may fall in love with many people during the lifetime. When you finally get your own happiness, you will understand the previous sadness is kind of treasure, which makes you better to hold and cherish the people you love.
